\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 78730}

\subsection*{Like Spinning in Circles for Hours}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Flowers}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 120 mg & oral & Pharms - Baclofen & pill / tablet\\
\hline
 T+ 1:00 & 40 mg & oral & Pharms - Baclofen & pill / tablet\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 122.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
The prescription bottle says may cause drowsiness\ldots  Major understatement if I take more than prescribed at a time. I took six 20mg tabs at 5pm then about 6pm I realized what I thought was them not working (didn't wait long enough) so I took two more tabs. By 8pm I was off the rocker staggering like an alcoholic just cant call it. I completely was dizzy out of my skull. Baclofen is a muscle relaxer that in the past I found to be very weak (Soma is the only muscle relaxer that works properly for my taste) but this time I was wasted. I am a Vietnam vet. I strongly suggest against taking 8 20mg baclofen. ok. thanks for reading\ldots  peace and love.

\end{document}
